author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Melco Holdings buys back 71,600 shares for 288.2 mln yen
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Melco Holdings Inc
* Says it repurchased 71,600 shares for 288.2 million yen in total, from Jan. 1 to Jan. 31
* Says this was part of the share repurchase plan announced on July 26, 2017
* Says it accumulatively repurchased 156,200 shares for 607.9 million yen in total as of Jan. 31
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/NrLTt4
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
